content: what is spooooookier than knitting a pair of socks these little ghosties are a fun way to add a bit of halloween to your outfit while keeping your toes toasty sizes s m l are for 7 8 9 or 18 20 23 cm circumference socks these socks are intended to use 0 5-1 1 3-2 5 cm of negative ease measure around the ball of the foot yarn requirements main color approximately 250-400 yards 72-100 grams fingering weight sock yarn contrast color approximately 50 yards 10 grams fingering weight sock yarn optional mohair for reinforcing heels and toes approximately 50 yards needles us size #1 2 25 mm 30 or longer circular needles for magic loop or needles needed to get gauge any sock knitting method can be used optional for colorwork us size #2 2 75 mm needles i prefer 9 circulars for this purpose gauge 8 stitches = 1 inch in stockinette stitch swatch mc with smaller needles notions scissors 3 removable stitch markers tapestry needle notes this pattern is written to be knit with the magic loop method however any sock knitting method may be used i recommend sizing up 1 needle for the colorwork portion only optional mohair is added as reinforcement to heels and toes it is held double with the mc and no other changes are made
